root: ^Hello and welcome to your new ship. My name is Detective Mark Zookerbert and we need your help urgently

c-0: ^Your mission is to explore 5 planets in the system and try and locate your baby that has been stolen and to discover what type of alien creatures have been taking babies.
^Many babies from many different planets have also been stolen so we need to quicly discover who has been taking these babies and why.
^There are 10 babies that are currently missing throughout the solar system so please help us try and locate some of them at least so they can return to their familes and home planets.
^In the ship we have provided you, we have given you a computer system which is an artificial intelligence program that can asist you along your mission.
^Be careful exploring each planet as you will come across some natives that do not want you on their planet.
^We have given you weapons so please use them wisely. Best wishes and good luck!
